title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta with garlic until crisp. Remove garlic.
Beat eggs with grated Parmesan and pepper.
Drain pasta, reserve a cup of pasta water.
Quickly toss hot pasta with egg-cheese mixture adding pasta water to create a sauce.
Mix in pancetta, adjust seasoning and serve immediately.
